meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>womb</radical> spins in a <radical>circle</radical> and starts to <radical>boil</radical> with <kanji>heat</kanji>. Uh oh, I think you have a <kanji>fever</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>heat</kanji> from your <kanji>fever</kanji> is making your insides and your head and your entire body spin and boil, until your doctor throws some <reading>nets</reading> (ねつ) around you. You were flailing around and they couldn't get you to stop, so they had to catch you in a series of nets.
